mapper.insert: insert into board(board_Code, board_Title, board_Content, log_longtitude, log_latitude, share_Type, board_Type_Code, user_id, randomViewY) values (#{board_Code}, #{board_Title},#{board_Content},#{log_longtitude},#{log_latitude},#{share_Type},#{board_Type_Code},#{user_id}, #{randomViewY})
insert into attached_file(board_Code, file_Content, file_Type) value (#{board_Code}, #{file_Content}, #{file_Type})
